subject: Update Call Association workflow task/lead creation nodes with integration_context
description:
Updated Call Association workflow (fkTzuzjXYwxSGtlr) via n8n_update_partial_workflow:
1. `parse_elevenlabs_data` code node: pushed local code with integration_context extraction (assignedToId, businessUnitId, campaignId) and three-tier fallback
2. `create_task` node: JSON body uses `$('parse_elevenlabs_data').first().json.assignedToId ?? $('get_auth_config').first().json.defaultEmployeeId` for reportedById/assignedToId, same pattern for businessUnitId
3. `create_lead` node: JSON body uses `$('parse_elevenlabs_data').first().json.campaignId ?? $('get_auth_config').first().json.newCustomerCampaignId`

Evidence: `tasks.md:3-6` - `- [x] 1.2 Update task creation logic` and `- [x] 1.3 Update lead creation logic`
API response: operationsApplied: 2 (task+lead) + 1 (parse code) = 3 total operations applied
activeForm: Updating Call Association task/lead creation nodes
